name: Be-Goose'd
description:
A prototype of a game I developed for a job application. The game was inspired by Nintendo's Duck Hunt for the NES. Use your mouse to aim at the geese, and left click to shoot them down for points. If enough geese fly away, you lose!

Some pre-made assets were used, such as:

  • Stylized Nature Kit by Ink Phantom Studio
  • AllSky Free by rpgwhitelock
  • KY Magic Effects by KAKKY
  • 48 Particle Effect Pack by GAPH
